body.p: In the Validation tab you configure the validation scenarios associated with the framework you are editing. These are the validation scenarios that are presented in the Configure Validation Scenarios dialog as associated with the type of the edited document.

You can set one or more of the scenarios from the Validation tab as default. The scenarios set here as default are rendered bold in the Configure Transformation Scenarios dialog and are also displayed on the tooltip of the Apply transformation Scenario(s) button.
